clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which CLK is connected to.

*See also: [bp5758d Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for DATA.

*See also: [bp5758d Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `bp5758d` component. Use this if you have multiple BP5758D chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [bp5758d Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#configuration-variables)*

bp5758d_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#bp5758d-component). Use this if you have multiple BP5758D chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [bp5758d Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#id1)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the BP5758D chain of this output component. Valid values are 1-5 **current** (*Optional*, int): Current in mA, valid values are 0-90, default 10.

*See also: [bp5758d Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [bp5758d Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/bp5758d.html#id1)*
